title: Returning Veteran LF DUO to Climb
body:
So little backstory about myself i used to be masters/challenger back in the day, just returning made a new account and wanted to experience climbing again.
So i've placed myself bottom of the bottom what people would describe elo hell.

So basically i'm looking for either a support main or a jungle main to duo with.

Requirements:
1) positive attitude
2) Communication
3) Commitment (Hours of grinding)
4) Be around my elo (B3 currently)
5) Friendly

So basically amt i hold a 80% winrate with adc and since swapping to adc if i get paired with a solid jg or support i rarely lose lane and can easily carry entire games.

If you are interested you can either comment on this post or through me an add

IG: I Used To Ward

Looking afford to hearing replies.

replies.body: you playing tonight? ill come along
